item.hooked.wood_hook.tip.normal:
A simple solution to escaping ditches and climbing trees.
<Hold Shift>
item.hooked.iron_hook.tip.normal:
Allows floating midair by firing two hooks at opposing points.
<Hold Shift>
item.hooked.diamond_hook.tip.normal:
Plenty of hooks, plenty of speed.
<Hold Shift>
item.hooked.wood_hook.tip.detail:
A simple solution to escaping ditches and climbing trees.
Press %1$s to fire hook.
Jump to retract all hooks.
item.hooked.iron_hook.tip.detail:
Allows floating midair by firing two hooks at opposing points.
Press %1$s to fire hook.
Jump to retract all hooks.
item.hooked.diamond_hook.tip.detail:
Plenty of hooks, plenty of speed.
Press %1$s to fire hook.
Jump to retract all hooks.
item.hooked.red_hook.tip.detail:
Creative flight, contained.
Press %1$s to fire hook.
Double jump to retract all hooks.
item.hooked.ender_hook.tip.detail:
Fast. Very, very fast.
Press %1$s to fire hook.
Jump to retract all hooks.
